pkgmetadata.longdescription: IUCN Red List Data // Facilitates access to the International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) Red List of Threatened Species, a comprehensive global inventory of species at risk of extinction. This package streamlines the process of determining conservation status by matching species names with Red List data, providing tools to easily query and retrieve conservation statuses. Designed to support biodiversity research and conservation planning, this package relies on data from the 'iucnrdata' package, available on GitHub https://github.com/PaulESantos/iucnrdata. To install the data package, use pak::pak('PaulESantos/iucnrdata').
